issue.title: buildings not showing up in MapQuery

content.raw:
The elevation map produced by your script is only a portion of the complete `swarm_terrain_257_random.png` terrain. I believe you are only seeing one ridge line due to the size of the search area. Are you seeing something else that is incorrect?

To adjust the size of the loop to get the buildings, you'll have to increase the [`<search_area>`](#!/osrf/swarm/src/24e6772b3f0fb13d68eccd639c13a1feddeb7de4/worlds/terrain_test.world.erb?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#terrain_test.world.erb-23)
content.html:
The elevation map produced by your script is only a portion of the complete swarm_terrain_257_random.png terrain. I believe you are only seeing one ridge line due to the size of the search area. Are you seeing something else that is incorrect?

To adjust the size of the loop to get the buildings, you'll have to increase the <search_area>
